overview_of_class: Ballet classes will cover warm up, barre, center, and across-the-floor work. The main emphasis will be on proper technique that will afford the dancer a lifelong physical and artistic outlet. Working with a sound understanding of alignment, weight transfer, use of momentum, dynamics, and musicality, the class will explore adagio, port de bras, pirouettes de hors and de dans, traveling turns, petit allegro, and grand allegro. French terminology will be incorporated into class.
name: Music Theatre Ballet
subject: DANCE
